name: strike mole
description:
《strike mole》 is a 3D hamster game, the main leisure.
Game description:
Eliminate these evil moles in the shortest time at the fastest speed!
Gameplay:
The game is divided into 12 levels. The first four levels are training levels. It is relatively simple, and the subsequent levels will require you to complete more mole strikes in a shorter period of time as the level increases. You need to be in a short time. Destroy them to unlock more levels.
Game features:
The Steam version includes Simplified Chinese and English versions. The language will automatically switch to your steam, full 3d screen, 12 levels.
